svg.class: absolute top-1/2 left-2 size-4 -translate-y-1/2 fill-none stroke-current stroke-2

path.class: translate-x-2 scale-x-0 transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out group-hover:translate-x-0 group-hover:scale-x-100 group-focus-visible:translate-x-0 group-focus-visible:scale-x-100
translate-x-1 transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out group-hover:translate-x-0 group-focus-visible:translate-x-0
